Class GcMonitor

monitor gabage collector activities see details in http://buildnewgames.com/garbage-collector-friendly-code/

  • Defined in: gcmonitor.js

Class Detail

GcMonitor()
detect gabarge collector occurance. Require v8 for now, so chrome or node.js. typical usage: new GcMonitor().start();

Method Detail

  • burnRate()
    getter for the burnRate
  • check(onChange)
    Check if currently used memory is less than previous check. If so it is assume a GC occured
    Parameters:
    {Function|undefined} onChange
    callback notified synchronously if gc occured
  • <static> {Boolean} GcMonitor.isAvailable()
    check if it is available on the plateform it runs on
    Returns:
    {Boolean} true if it is available, false otherwise
  • start(onChange, period)
    Start monitoring periodically
    Parameters:
    {Function|undefined} onChange
    optional function to notify when gc occurs
    {Number|undefined} period
    period of the check. default to 50ms
  • stop()
    Stop monitoring periodically
  • {Number} usedHeapSize()
    getter for the usedHeapSize
    Returns:
    {Number} used heap size in byte
